text: Virgin Snow is a 2007 South Korean–Japanese film. It may also refer to: * Virgin Snow (album), 1988 Cantopop album by Leslie Cheung * Virgin Snow, 1980s travel venture by Virgin Group * "Virgin Snow", 1990 song by Japanese band Ribbon * "Virgin Snow", 1997 song by Jordan Rudess from the album Secrets of the Muse * Virgin snow is also a skiing term
title: Virgin Snow (disambiguation)
